ThingDef.label: X-mecha SOEM
ThingDef.description: The pinnacle of prosthetics of the "Mechalit" faction. With the help of strong processing of the generators of psi-impulse of animals, it turns the owner into an absolutely emotional "Creature". The colonist completely loses his mood, any of its manifestations, both bad (nervous breakdowns) and good (inspiration), and he no longer needs any entertainment and amenities. Fortunately, the owner does not lose social skills, but the implant also has a flaw - it disrupts the temperature balance of the owner's body, from which he can throw both heat and shiver at the same time. It is recommended that the wearer prepare clothes with good insulation from both cold and heat in advance, otherwise he cannot be saved. In addition, the implant increases the sensitivity to pain. Therefore, in battle, the owner of the implant will be less effective..
